My VR Room.unity: Trigger public method on PlaySoundsFromList (MonoBehaviour fileID=1734837741, m_Script guid=76a895b5e674db04d8b4f8110c068852, script fileID=11500000) attached to GameObject fileID=1734837740. Serialized config: shouldLoop=1, audioClips count=3 (guids fe112c6648072400daed693075b62682, 17e53586d00594414b8cb9c4bf7cfd7e, 9b225ef4f19cf441f8d7df84ea0f21ad). Expect audioSource.clip=audioClips[index] and playback to start.
Toggle playback state to pause; playing should become false and AudioSource.Pause called.
Toggle playback state to resume; playing should become true and AudioSource.Play called.
Advance to next clip; expect index to increment modulo 3 (0->1, 1->2, 2->0) and new clip plays.
Advance to next clip again; continue modulo behavior and playback of new clip.
Advance to next clip a third time; verify wrap-around to index 0 and playback restarts (looping should keep playing when clips end).

Go to previous clip from current index; known risk: implementation uses (--index % count) with Mathf.Abs in PlayClip, so from index 0 result may incorrectly select index 1 instead of last. Observe selected clip and playback.
Pick a random clip; expect index in [0,2] and playback of chosen clip.
Pause current clip; playing should be set to false and AudioSource.Pause called.
Stop current clip; playing should be set to false and AudioSource.Stop called.
